section.title: Discovering Amazon EC2 Cloud Providers
section.para: CloudForms Management Engine provides the ability to discover cloud providers associated with a particular set of Amazon EC2 account details.

procedure.title: To Discover an Amazon EC2 Cloud Provider

step.para: Enter your Amazon EC2 User ID and Password. Reenter your password in the Verify Password field.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The Amazon EC2 providers discovery begins. CloudForms Management Engine adds all cloud providers associated with the chosen account.
